name: WebGL2RenderingContext.bindTransformFeedback
description: The WebGL2RenderingContext.bindTransformFeedback() method of the WebGL 2 API binds a passed WebGLTransformFeedback object to the current GL state.

refs.name: WebGL 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'bindTransformFeedback' in the 'WebGL 2.0' specification.
